LanguageData.INSWall_Fibre.label: Insulated wall (Fibres)
LanguageData.INSWall_Fibre.description: An impassable wall, capable of holding up a roof. This wall is insulated with fibres.

LanguageData.INSWall_Fibre_Frame.label: Insulated wall (Fibres) (building)
LanguageData.INSWall_Fibre_Frame.description: An impassable wall, capable of holding up a roof. This wall is insulated with fibres.
